trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator" /> 控件提供设计时支持。

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from source view to design view, the markup that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator> control is parsed.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中，当你从源视图设计视图中，切换标记，它描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AdRotator>分析控件。

trans-unit.source: A design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to source view, the design-time control code is persisted to the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当你切换回源视图时，该设计时控件代码将保留到 Web 页的标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AdRotatorDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AdRotatorDesigner" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Generates the markup that is used to render the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 生成用于在设计图面上呈现该控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: The markup that represents the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在设计图面上表示该控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a templated data-bound control designer, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何重写的代码示例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法在模板化数据绑定控件设计器中，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the control that is associated with this designer has templates, it displays the templates in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 如果与此设计器关联的控件模板，它在设计器中显示的模板。
